document_data.name: ''Buckley's Buckler''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Buckley's buckler''''' was a [[target shield]] that was made of [[mammoth]] hide.
document_data.Description: The buckler, which was awfully tanned, smelled of decay. Not even the most powerful substances could get rid of the stench.
document_data.Powers: As well as providing more defense, the shield seemed to fortify the wielder, making them more vigorous.
